content: Beam Clamp Wide mouth Wide-mouth beam clamp for attaching threaded rods to structural beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features No drilling or welding necessary Each clamp is completely pre-assembled and suits all usual sizes of I-beams Extra wide opening allows clamping to steel up to 1-1/4 thick Hardened cup point set screw and locknut Applications To secure threaded rods to steel beams ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material type: Steel Rod size - RS: 1/2 in Material composition: Ductil iron casting - ASTM A563 Technical Data | Base material type | Steel | Rod size - RS | 1/2 in | Material composition | Ductil iron casting - ASTM A563 | Surface finish | Plain | Environmental conditions | Indoor | Tightening torque | 10 ft-lbf | Height - H | 2-3/4 in | X | 1-3/16 in | Load range | Medium duty | Weight | 281 g ### ITEMS- 306603 - Beam clamp BC-WM 1/2 - Package Size 50 pc
tag_description: Wide-mouth beam clamp for attaching threaded rods to structural beams
